INSTANT FED ANALYSIS: Markets react hawkishly to FOMC decision

FOMC QUICK SUMMARY: FOMC cuts FFR 25bps to 1.75-2.00%, as expected; 2 hawkish dissenters (George/Rosengren), Bullard wanted -50bps; IOER cut 30bps to 1.8%; sustained expansion still seen, uncertainties still remain. Dots lowered, long-run still at 2.5%.
